BEST GAME EVER. 
Master piece of Valve, with an amazing script, incredible what can be done with only a handful of voice actors.
Game itself is also mindblowing, with a very easy to pick up mechanic, which evolves into intrincate puzzles that will make you sweat to acomplish. I couldn't think of a better game to recommend to anyone.

Think Portals.
Por culpa de este juego quero una patata parlante...

A great game that challenges us all the time as well as being very fun, especially in co-op mode where actions directly depend on the cooperation of both players so the puzzles can be resolved. Or if you prefer, you can just troll your friend, causing him to die letting him fall on cliffs, water and other killing locations.

It's a very fun and intelligent game that I totally recommend.

Magnífico! Outra palavra não seria capaz de expressar o que Portal 2 é.
O primeiro já era um bom jogo, o segundo só melhorou ainda mais a fórmula. Maior desenvolvimento da história, passamos pelo passado e pelo presente da Aperture Science. Novas mecânicas, como as dos géis ,só acrescentaram ainda mais pra tornar o jogo melhor.
E claro, não posso esquecer da GLaDOS, uma das melhores personagens já criadas, e do Wheatley, que foi uma boa adição ao elenco robótico do jogo.
Portal 2 ist sein Geld Wert! :D

Score: 10.0

This game is just AWESOME! The quality of the engine and physics achieved from the first game, Portal, deffinitely show the skills of a great team! Funy and engaging plot! A must in your library!
Very fun quick thinking game, but it gets better when you have a partner.

A great title (no pun intended! The Aperture Complex is colossal!!), one of my favorites! What attracted me more to Portal 2 was the mix action+puzzle, with an emphasis on the last one. There are a lot of shooting games, and most of them are quite repetitive, different storylines but very similar mechanics and objectives. So a game such as the Portal series brings this differential, you don't have foes you need to shoot and kill to go on (alright, you've got the drones, but it's not the same), you need to use your smarts to overcome the challenges which (believe me) are pretty fun to figure out "how the hell am I supposed to solve this puzzle???". If you like a dynamic game with an intriguing plot, comic characters and dialogues (you'll laugh a lot with Wheatley), and nice puzzles (watch out for the secrets!), dude... Get this game!
В это нужно поиграть всем!
Honestly one of my all time favorite games.

This Is an Amazing game, It carrys on MOST of the stuff that happened in the first game.
The Artwork is good, but it is confusing on which parts are actualy portal surfaces.
The Story is Good, it trys to be funny but doesn't quite make it.
The Co-Op is good, but still very buggy and short.

Over-all it is A Brilliant Game and definitely worth buying; If you are a little short on funds, this game comes on sale quite often, so that should not be a problem.

I'm late to the Portal games but so glad I finally arrived.

Everything that was perfect about the first game is made even better in the second. The campaign is equal parts challenging and hilarious and has been made much longer than the first, although it won't feel that way; time flies when you're having fun.

With a few days left in the sale, keep your eyes open for this, it's definitely worthwhile

There are little words that can explain this game. I loved every part of this game and it's a great sequel to the first game! The graphics are breath taking, the story line is epic, and who doesn't like defining the laws of physics? The cliff hanging ending is horrible because well.... it's the end of the game and I would love to play more! I hope theres a third game someday... someday...

Portal.
Richtig gut!

Just finished the game. It has an amazing story and you go through it alongside robots with full of sarcasm. I have never had this much emotion in a single game. You laugh, you feel sad, you feel bossy and you might even cry at the end.. [spoiler]We did it potato, we are free![/spoiler] I really liked how antogist was designed in the game. Beside that, this game might seem to be simple (open portal, close portal) but it IS quite challenging towards the end and you really need to think outside the box [i](sarcasm off).[/i] Overall I give 8.5/10 to this game and really recommend you buy it. You should buy the first Portal, too if you haven't played, yet.
